content.question:
The enzyme peroxidase is found in many organisms. It catalyzes the breakdown of hydrogen peroxide into water and oxygen gas. The rate of peroxidase activity at different <math alttext="p H" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>p</mtext><mtext>H</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> values was assessed by students in the lab. The students’ results are shown in graph 1.

Graph 1. Effect of <math alttext="p H" overflow="scroll"><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mtext></mtext><mrow><mi>p</mi><mtext>H</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> on peroxidase activity

If the experiment is repeated at <math alttext="p H" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mtext>pH</mtext></mrow></math> 11, the observed activity level of the enzyme will most likely be

choices.label: the same as the level at <math alttext="p H" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>p</mtext><mtext>H</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> 7
lower than the level at <math alttext="p H" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>p</mtext><mtext>H</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> 9
greater than the level at <math alttext="p H" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>p</mtext><mtext>H</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> 9

between the levels observed at <math alttext="p H" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>p</mtext><mtext>H</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> 5 and <math alttext="p H" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>p</mtext><mtext>H</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> 7.

content.answer: lower than the level at <math alttext="p H" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>p</mtext><mtext>H</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> 9

skill.text: 6.E: Predict the causes or effects of a change in, or disruption to, one or more components in a biological system.
